prompt: A portrait of Noah Smith, a (dead:1.2) human male with long red hair that lightens to a brighter shade at the ends, tied back in a ponytail. He has fair skin and a scar above his left eye, which is pure black with a white symbol as a pupil. His right eye is red. He possesses Ennard, an animatronic.  He wears a white sleeveless shirt, a red jacket, dark blue jeans, and black shoes. His earrings are two cross-shaped illusion disks, a gift from Michael, his boyfriend.  He has angel wings; one white with a glowing red outline, the other black with a glowing purple outline. He bears a stab wound on his chest and a mark around his neck from his death. In an alternative outfit, he wears a white sleeveless high-collar shirt, black or khaki shorts, brown shoes of uneven height, and a mask. His expression is complex, a blend of (sadness:1.1), (longing:1.0), and a hint of (dark amusement:0.8). His (intense gaze:1.2) reveals his internal turmoil.  The style is (semi-realistic:1.3), focusing on (detailed facial features:1.4), and highlighting the contrast between his gentle and violent sides. (Dramatic lighting:1.2), (cinematic lighting:1.1). Background is subtly dark, highlighting his character. (Anime-style eyes: 0.9)
